summary: The 'Tax Relief Unleashed for Seniors by Trump Act' (H.R. 1129) aims to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the exclusion from gross income of social security benefits for senior citizens. The bill proposes raising the income thresholds for exclusion eligibility and includes provisions for inflation adjustments starting in 2027. The effective date for the changes is for taxable years beginning after December 31, 2025.
